categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Midnight" was the nickname of a human male ace fighter pilot of the First Order who flew under the callsign Omega Leader and commanded Omega Squadron, a TIE/fo space superiority fighter squadron that served in the First Order starfighter corps. At one point, "Midnight" flew above a terrestrial body and was fired upon. Midnight was equipped with a First Order pilot uniform, had fair skin and dark blonde hair.
